3 LIFTState::LIFTState(ros::NodeHandle node) : move_base_clt_("move_base", false)
4 {
5  lift_init_pub_ = node.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("TX2_liftSubscriber_state", 1);
6  lift_complete_sub_ = node.subscribe("RIO_liftPublisher_state", 0, &LIFTState::liftCallback, this);
7  cmd_vel_pub_ = node.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/unicorn/cmd_vel", 0);
8  move_base_cancel_pub_ = node.advertise<actionlib_msgs::GoalID>("/move_base/cancel", 0);
9  state_identifier_ = STATE_LIFT;
10 }

17 Command LIFTState::run()
18 {
19  std_msgs::Bool msg;
20  msg.data = true;
21  Command new_cmd;
22  new_cmd.state = STATE_IDLE;
23  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Lifting refuse bin, awaiting completion signal...");
24  ros::Rate rate(10);
25  while (ros::ok())
26  {
27  ros::spinOnce();
28  if (command.state != -1)
29  {
30  cancelGoal();
31  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] New command was issued, halting navigation.");
32  return command;
33  }
34  if (lift_complete_)
35  {
36  break;
37  }
38  rate.sleep();
39  }
40  reverseFromBin();
41  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Exiting to IDLE state.");
42  return new_cmd;
43 }
44 
45 void LIFTState::liftCallback(const std_msgs::Int32 &recieveMsg)
46 {
47  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Lift completion signal recieved.");
48  if (recieveMsg.data == 5)
49  {
50  lift_complete_ = true;
51  }
52 }
53 
54 void LIFTState::reverseFromBin()
55 {
56  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Reversing from the refuse bin.");
57  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
58  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.15;
59  ros::Rate rate(10);
60  int i = 0;
61  while (i < 2)
62  {
63  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
64  i++;
65  rate.sleep();
66  }
67  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
68  cancelGoal();
69  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
70  return;
71 }
72 
73 void LIFTState::cancelGoal()
74 {
75  actionlib_msgs::GoalID cancel_all;
76  move_base_cancel_pub_.publish(cancel_all);
77  ROS_INFO("[UNICORN State Machine] Canceling move_base goal");
78 }
